---
title: "Field Descriptions"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  comment = "#>"
)

with_dt <- requireNamespace("DT")

```

```{r eval = with_dt}
DT::datatable(nflfastR::field_descriptions,options = list(scrollX = TRUE, pageLength = 25), filter = "top", rownames = FALSE)
```

```{r eval = !with_dt}
knitr::kable(nflfastR::field_descriptions)
```
